ComicInfo.Summary:
“OUTER ASPECTS OF INNER ATTITUDES,” Part Two
Tajo returns to Salus to find a city on the brink of death, clinging to life. The Caines’ struggle to lift humanity out of the depths is far from over...
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|---------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Greg Tocchini | 1 | | B | Cover B | Eric Powell | 2 |
